name: abbiiOLDOLD
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: mpgbi(s0, wceq(cab(s0, w0), cab(s0, w1)), wb(w0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cab(s0, w0), cab(s0, w1))
-| wb(wal(s0, wb(w0, w1)), wceq(cab(s0, w0), cab(s0, w1)))
-| wb(w0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cab(s0, w0), cab(s0, w1))
-| wb(wal(s0, wb(w0, w1)), wceq(cab(s0, w0), cab(s0, w1)))
-| wb(w0, w1)

body.origin: |- wb(wal(s0, wb(w0, w1)), wceq(cab(s0, w0), cab(s0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cab(s0, w0), cab(s0, w1))
-| wb(w0, w1)

comment: Obsolete version of ~ abbii as of 3-May-2023. Equivalent wff's yield equal class abstractions (inference form). (Contributed by NM, 26-May-1993.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
